jobDescription: Database Administrators (work in Northville, MI & various unanticipated locations throughout U.S.) to coordinate changes to database and test and implement database using 1 or more following skills: SharePoint, SQL Server, Oracle, Informatica, MicroStrategy, Teradata, Hadoop, SSIS, SSRS, SSAS, Tableau, Java, J2EE, BIOS, ESXi, HTML, SQL, PL/SQL, UNIX, XML, Selenium WebDriver, CSS, C#, VB.NET, MS Visio, JavaScript, WebLogic, Hibernate, DB2, SAP, Cassandra, AWS Cloud, Azure Cloud, DataStage  (#DBA1) Reqs Masters + 3 yrs relevant experience or Bachelors + 5 yrs progressive experience. Required exp must include 3 yrs using 1 or more listed skills.  (#DBA2) Reqs Masters + 12 mos relevant experience. Required experience must include 12 mos using 1 or more listed skills.  (#DBA3) Reqs Masters + 6 mos relevant experience. Required experience must include 6 mos using 1 or more listed skills.  (#DBA4) Reqs Bachelors + 12 mos relevant experience. Required experience must include 12 mos using 1 or more listed skills.  (#DBA5) Reqs Bachelors + 2 yrs relevant experience or 3 yrs college education + 3 yrs relevant experience. Required exp must include 2 yrs using 1 or more listed skills.  For all positions will accept foreign educational equivalent of required degree & requires travel/relocation to various unanticipated locations throughout U.S. Send resume (specify ID#): Reliable Software Resources, Inc, 22260 Haggerty Rd, Suite 285, Northville, MI 48167 Equal Employment Opportunity Reliable Software employment does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age or any other basis as covered by federal, state, or local law.  Employment decisions are based solely on qualifications, merit and business needs. Apply Now
